version_description:
- The Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Cosmic Eclipse expansion will be available in the game for code redemption on October 31 and in the Shop on November 1. 
- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at https://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- The Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Unified Minds expansion will be available in the game for code redemption on July 30 and in the Shop on August 2.
- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- Major refactor of the server logic for resolving attacks to address multiple long-standing, systemic bugs and improve overall consistency of gameplay.
- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

HIGHLIGHTS
- Updated foil effects implemented for all Legacy format expansions.
- Updated end-of-match rewards for Versus matches
- Increased earn rate for Versus Points

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

HIGHLIGHTS
- The Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Burning Shadows expansion is available in the game starting August 3! 
- Updated mulligan interface!
- Legacy and Expanded format boosters and theme decks in the Shop!

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

HIGHLIGHTS
- Improved the presentation of the match results screen

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

HIGHLIGHTS
- The Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Crimson Invasion expansion is available in the game starting November 3! 

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

HIGHLIGHTS
- The Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Ultra Prism expansion is available in the game starting February 2! 
- The full list of Versus Rewards can now be viewed at any time!
- Additional filtering options available!

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- The Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Forbidden Light expansion is available in the game starting May 4.
- Additional rarity distribution details for booster packs are available in the Shop.
- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- The Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Celestial Storm expansion is available in the game starting August 3.
- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- The Pokémon TCG: Dragon Majesty expansion is available in the game starting September 6.
- Quick Match has been removed from the Play menu.
- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- The Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Lost Thunder expansion is available in the game starting November 1.
- Event Tickets and Gems can no longer be purchased with real money.
- Gems will be retired as a digital currency on December 10.
- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- Gems have been retired as a digital currency. Logging in to the game will automatically convert unspent Gems to tradable booster packs and Trainer Tokens.
- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- The Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Team Up expansion is available in the game for code redemption on January 31 and in the Shop on February 1.
- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- The Pokémon TCG: Detective Pikachu expansion is available in the game for code redemption on March 29.
- Game client upgraded to a more recent version of the Unity game engine.
- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- The Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Unbroken Bonds expansion is available in the game for code redemption on May 2 and in the Shop on May 3.
- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- Major refactor of the server logic for resolving attacks to address multiple long-standing, systemic bugs and improve overall consistency of gameplay.
- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at http://forums.pokemontcg.com.

- The Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Unified Minds expansion will be available in the game for code redemption on July 30 and in the Shop on August 2.
- Bug fixes

- The Pokémon TCG: Sword & Shield expansion will be available in the game for code redemption on February 6 and in the Shop on February 7. 
- Applied the game rules changes and card errata recently announced at Pokemon.com/TCGUpdates. These changes take effect in the game client immediately.
- Updated the appearance of the playmat and tabletop design.
- Bug fixes

Full patch notes available at https://forums.pokemontcg.com.
